titleStmt.title: A book of directions and cures done by that safe and successful medicine, called, Nendick's popular pill deservedly so called for it's special vertues in curing that popular disease, the scurvy : which corrupts the blood this pill cures, by cleansing of the blood, purging by urine, and gently by stool.
titleStmt.author: Nendick, Humphrey.

notesStmt.note: Signed at foot of p. [1]: by me, Humphrey Nendick.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
